II. Purpose of Addendum
Bethany Christian Services-Traverse City moved its office from Cass Road to 1055
Carriage Hill Drive, Traverse City, MI 49686 on 12/10/2007.
III. Methodology
An on-site inspection was made on 12/13/2007 to the office at 1055 Carriage Hill
Drive, Traverse City, MI 49686.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Bethany Christian Services-Traverse City moved its offices to a modern one-story
office building in which they are occupying 3 units for a total of 4620 square feet.
The new office is located across from the Grand Traverse County Health
Department. The plan is to install doorways between the units to have them
interconnect. Bethany Christian Services-Traverse City is part of the larger Bethany
Christian Services organization that has 77 offices.
R 400.12204 Facilities.
An agency shall provide and maintain sufficient office space,
equipment, and supplies to ensure the delivery of services.
Bethany Christian Services-Traverse City’s new office at 1055 Carriage Hill Drive,
Traverse City, MI 49686 provides sufficient office space, equipment, and supplies to
ensure the delivery of services.
V. Recommendation
I recommend that this private Child Placing Agency continue the current status of its
license in this new Traverse City location.
